intro: Anneslia rusbyi, commonly known as the Rusby's anneslia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Scrophulariaceae and is characterized by its striking, tubular flowers that range in color from white to pink. The plant typically grows in rocky, well-drained soils and thrives in full sun. Its leaves are lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, contributing to its distinctive appearance. Anneslia rusbyi is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and botanical collections.
